title: Set Error function as virtual so that custom log location can be used
body:
#### Expected Behavior
Error function can be overridden by the user so that logs could be sent to a database.

#### Actual Behavior
`cannot override inherited member 'QCAlgorithm.Error(Exception)' because it is not marked virtual, abstract, or override`	error

#### Potential Solution
Set `Error` as `public virtual`

#### Reproducing the Problem
add this code into an algorithm
```
  public override void Error(Exception error)
  {
    base.Error(error);
  }
```
build, see error
#### System Information
windows 10

comments.body: Hey @superichmann! Seems like a custom result handler might do the trick generically
